Package library.math

Class Vector2D

java.lang.Object
library.math.Vector2D
public class Vector2D extends Object
Vector class for managing vectors in a 2-dimensional space

    Creates a Vector2D using polar coordinates (direction & magnitude)
    float
    dotProduct(Vector2D v)
    Calculates the dot product of 2 vectors, The dot product can be useful multiple calculations: If the dot product is < 0, the vectors are pointing in roughly the same direction If the dot product is > 0, the vectors are pointing in roughly opposite directions If the dot product == 0, the vectors are perpendicular

    • dotProduct

      public float dotProduct(Vector2D v)
      Calculates the dot product of 2 vectors, The dot product can be useful multiple calculations: If the dot product is < 0, the vectors are pointing in roughly the same direction If the dot product is > 0, the vectors are pointing in roughly opposite directions If the dot product == 0, the vectors are perpendicular
      Parameters:
      v - the other vector
      Returns:
      the dot product of the two vectors
